success.quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.
success.author: Winston Churchill

success.quote: Don't be afraid to give up the good to go for the great.
success.author: John D. Rockefeller

success.quote: Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it.
success.author: Henry David Thoreau

opportunity.quote: In the middle of difficulty lies opportunity.
opportunity.author: Albert Einstein

opportunity.quote: Opportunities don't happen. You create them.
opportunity.author: Chris Grosser

opportunity.quote: Success is where preparation and opportunity meet.
opportunity.author: Bobby Unser

perseverance.quote: Perseverance is not a long race; it is many short races one after the other.
perseverance.author: Walter Elliot

perseverance.quote: It always seems impossible until it's done.
perseverance.author: Nelson Mandela

perseverance.quote: Through perseverance many people win success out of what seemed destined to be certain failure.
perseverance.author: Benjamin Disraeli

self-discipline.quote: We must all suffer one of two things: the pain of discipline or the pain of regret.
self-discipline.author: Jim Rohn

self-discipline.quote: Discipline is the bridge between goals and accomplishment.
self-discipline.author: Jim Rohn

self-discipline.quote: Self-discipline is when your conscience tells you to do something and you don’t talk back.
self-discipline.author: W. K. Hope

never-give-up.quote: Never give up on something that you can’t go a day without thinking about.
never-give-up.author: Winston Churchill

never-give-up.quote: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
never-give-up.author: Confucius

never-give-up.quote: Our greatest glory is not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
never-give-up.author: Confucius
